titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that tax legislation should not take effect earlier than 90 days after implementing regulations are issued.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/3/1988--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Congress that any provision of law affecting a person's tax liability should not take effect earlier than 90 days after the Internal Revenue Service issues regulations implementing the provision.
